item.text: Dear friends, do not believe every spirit, but test the spirits to determine if they are from God, because many false prophets have gone out into the world.

<st data-num="1722" class="">By</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>: <st data-num="3956" class="">Every</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3670" class="">confesses</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> as the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="3" /> who has <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,
but every spirit that refuses to confess Jesus, that spirit is not from God, and this is the spirit of the antichrist, which you have heard is coming, and now is already in the world.
You are from God, little children, and have conquered them because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world.

They <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>; <st data-num="1223 3778">therefore</st> they <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world’s</st> perspective <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="191" class="">listens</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
We are from God; the person who knows God listens to us, but whoever is not from God does not listen to us. By this we know the Spirit of truth and the spirit of deceit.
Dear friends, let us love one another, because love is from God, and everyone who loves has been fathered by God and knows God.

The person who does <st data-num="3361">not</st> <st data-num="25">love</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">By</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="5319" class="">revealed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473">us</st>:<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3439">one and only</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> we may <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
In this is love: not that we have loved God, but that he loved us and sent his Son to be the atoning sacrifice for our sins.
Dear friends, if God so loved us, then we also ought to love one another.

<st data-num="3762" class="">No one</st> has <st data-num="2300" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="4455">at any time</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> we <st data-num="25">love</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">resides</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> is <st data-num="5048" class="">perfected</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">By</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="1" /> we <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="3306" class="">reside</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>: in <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> has <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.<n id="3" />
And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son to be the Savior of the world.
If anyone confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God resides in him and he in God.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> have <st data-num="1097">come to know</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the one who <st data-num="3306" class="">resides</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">resides</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">resides</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1722" class="">By</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> is <st data-num="5048" class="">perfected</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> we may <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3954" class="">confidence</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">Jesus</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>, so <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.

There <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5046" class="">perfect</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="906" class="">drives</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">out</st> <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="2192">has to do</st> with <st data-num="2851" class="">punishment</st>.<n id="1" /> The<n id="2" /> one who <st data-num="5399" class="">fears</st> punishment<n id="3" /> has <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="5048" class="">perfected</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>.
We love because he loved us first.
If anyone says “I love God” and yet hates his fellow Christian, he is a liar because the one who does not love his fellow Christian whom he has seen cannot love God whom he has not seen.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> is <st data-num="3778">this</st>: <st data-num="2443">that</st><n id="1" /> the one who <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> should <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80">fellow Christian</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>.
